item.title: Piece By Piece Digital Release Date Revealed After Pharrell Biopic With 90% RT Score Didn’t Take Off At The Box Office
item.description: The digital release date for Piece by Piece gets revealed after the critically acclaimed Pharrell Williams biopic didn't take off in theaters.

item.title: Superman & Lois' Superboy Actor Reveals Whether He'd Join James Gunn's DC Universe
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Alex Garfin, who plays Jordan Kent/Superboy on Superman & Lois, shares if he would be game to join James Gunn's upcoming DC Universe.

item.title: The Village Started M. Night Shyamalan's Fall From Grace, But It's A Much Better Horror Movie Than You Remember
item.description: M. Night Shyamalan’s The Village may have marked a career downturn, but its tense atmosphere and themes make it a fantastic horror film.
